ExportItemConfig.Query: SELECT id,kind,title,trade_no,amount,csn_amount,create_time from mm_balance_info INNER JOIN mm_account ON mm_balance_info.member_id = mm_account.member_id INNER JOIN mm_relation ON mm_relation.member_id = mm_balance_info.member_id WHERE mm_balance_info.member_id = {member_id} AND mm_relation.reg_merchant_id = {merchant_id} AND title LIKE '%{title}%' AND (trade_no IS NULL OR trade_no LIKE '%{trade_no}%') ORDER BY mm_balance_info.create_time DESC LIMIT {page_start},{page_size}
ExportItemConfig.Total: SELECT COUNT(0) from mm_balance_info INNER JOIN mm_account ON mm_balance_info.member_id = mm_account.member_id INNER JOIN mm_relation ON mm_relation.member_id = mm_balance_info.member_id WHERE mm_balance_info.member_id = {member_id} AND mm_relation.reg_merchant_id = {merchant_id} AND title LIKE '%{title}%' AND (trade_no IS NULL OR trade_no LIKE '%{trade_no}%')
